description.en:
Welcome to the future of data storage
A new data storage blockchain protocol based on a novel proof of access consensus mechanism that creates truly permanent data storage for the first time. Now data is finally permanent, low-cost, and truly censorship free.

Arweave has solved the millennia old problem of decentralised data availability.
Pay Once, Store Forever.
Arweave makes permanent data storage a reality for the very first time. As the $3 trillion data-storage industry is growing, the need for cheap, distributed, permanent data-storage on the blockchain has become an urgent necessity.

ico_data.short_desc: The New Backbone of the Decentralised Internet, Arweave is a new data storage blockchain protocol based on a novel proof of access consensus mechanism.
